17 namespace vistle {
18 
19 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
20 // DECLARATION OF STRUCTUREDGRID
21 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
22 class V_COREEXPORT StructuredGrid: public Coords, virtual public StructuredGridBase, virtual public CelltreeInterface<3> {
23  V_OBJECT(StructuredGrid);
24 
25 public:
26  typedef Coords Base;
27  typedef typename CelltreeInterface<3>::Celltree Celltree;
28 
29  // constructor
30  StructuredGrid(const Index numVert_x, const Index numVert_y, const Index numVert_z, const Meta &meta = Meta());
31 
32  // get functions for metadata
33  Index getNumDivisions(int c) override { return d()->numDivisions[c]; }
34  Index getNumDivisions(int c) const override { return m_numDivisions[c]; }
35  Index getNumGhostLayers(unsigned dim, GhostLayerPosition pos) override;
36  Index getNumGhostLayers(unsigned dim, GhostLayerPosition pos) const override;
37 
38  // virtual set functions
39  void setNumGhostLayers(unsigned dim, GhostLayerPosition pos, unsigned value) override;
40 
41  // GridInterface
42  Index getNumVertices() const override;
43  std::pair<Vector, Vector> getBounds() const override;
44  Normals::const_ptr normals() const override;
45  void setNormals(Normals::const_ptr normals);
46  std::pair<Vector, Vector> cellBounds(Index elem) const override;
47  Index findCell(const Vector &point, Index hint=InvalidIndex, int flags=NoFlags) const override;
48  bool inside(Index elem, const Vector &point) const override;
49  Interpolator getInterpolator(Index elem, const Vector &point, DataBase::Mapping mapping=DataBase::Vertex, InterpolationMode mode=Linear) const override;
50 
51  bool hasCelltree() const override;
52  Celltree::const_ptr getCelltree() const override;
53  bool validateCelltree() const override;
54  Scalar exitDistance(Index elem, const Vector &point, const Vector &dir) const override;
55  Vector getVertex(Index v) const override;
56 
57 private:
58  // mutable pointers to ShmVectors
59  mutable Index m_numDivisions[3];
60  mutable Index m_ghostLayers[3][2];
61  mutable Celltree::const_ptr m_celltree;
62 
63  void createCelltree(Index dims[]) const;
64 
65  // data object
66  V_DATA_BEGIN(StructuredGrid);
67 
68  shm_obj_ref<Normals> normals;
69  Index numDivisions[3]; //< number of divisions on each axis (1 more than number of cells)
70  Index ghostLayers[3][2]; //< number of ghost cell layers in each of x, y, z directions
71 
72  Data(const Index numVert_x, const Index numVert_y, const Index numVert_z, const std::string & name, const Meta &meta = Meta());
73  ~Data();
74  static Data *create(const Index numVert_x = 0, const Index numVert_y = 0, const Index numVert_z = 0, const Meta &meta = Meta());
75 
76  V_DATA_END(StructuredGrid);
77 };
